entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow beginning late this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:28 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:28 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near zero.
